pages.text: $(l)$(6)Function:$() Sieves the blocks provided when a mesh is available. $(br2) $(l)$(6)Same as:$() Right clicking a sieve with a sievable block and pick the drops.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: $(li)$(l)$(6)Extra info:$() This uses two slots, magenta and blue for input. Magenta is the mesh input and blue is for blocks that can be sieved.
